name: Dungeon Builder S
description:
The adventurers are always curious about the mystery of Dungeon

And you will build a new one

Take the bones of the adventurer as the material

Take the Souls of the Adventurer as the source of life of Monsters

Take the Resentment of the dead as the magic of the Dungeon

Build a world famous Dungeon

To create a frightened Monster army

Now !

Aim at the top of world, Start!



This is a game of simulation of dungeon.

There are many kinds of rooms that can be built,each one have a different function.You can configure the Creatures, or place traps. Some rooms can strengthen the ability.

In addition, you can create different creatures, these creatures will be the most powerful regiment to defeat the adventurers.The creatures can be synthesized,they will become a more powerful creature, such as the Lord of Fire, Black Dragon.

In addition, adventurers have different occupations,they will be stronger with the evaluation of Dungeon. Adventurers also have different abilities, such as thieves can destroy the traps.Adventurers will also carry a equipment, you will get the equipment if they die. Besides,these equipment have different functions,remember to place it in the room.
